Summary: Witness saw stationary object in sky for about 20 minutes.
divs: sighting detailssighting report: at previous location: 901 walter st. bedford, tx 76022 county: tarrant weather conditions: bright & sunny day - no clouds... sighting: midday, on, or about, late spring (say march, april, may, june, 1986 - 1988), or early fall (say august, september, or october, 1986 - 1988), {dates of sighting become rather fuzzy, though), i was witness, along with my entire family at the time (mother, brother, and sister) to a stationary ufo over bedford, tx. i would estimate it was no further distant than 1.0 - 1.50 miles up to the northeast (possibly over the highway - sr 183\121) in an apparent "observation" mode. possibly, it was a "scout" ship... maybe, it forgot to turn on it s cloaking device. nonetheless, the u.f.o. just hung up there in broad daylight for what seemed awhile, 15 - 20 minutes, at about a 35 - 45 degree angle. the appearance was completely round, as it appeared about a dime to nickel - sized coin could completely cover it and in exactly the same dimensions (perfectly round appearing object). the u.f.o. had five smaller perfect circles inside the outer perfect circle (it s body). each of the five perfect circles were the same size & appeared whiter (white hot) to the sight. therefore, i imagined they were it s engines, though they might not have been... there were no photographs, or videotape, of the event, and as far as i know no one has ever come forward with this information before. i walked from the back yard, to the front yard, during the duration of this sighting, but when i went inside the house to retrieve an item (like tea, binoculars, etc.) it was gone upon returning outside. the u.f.o. might ve noticed it was noticed... now, the u.s. air force might rationalize it all & say "oh, it was just a weather ballon," or other some such thing. even though there was a light wind blowing from the west, the object (believed u.f.o.) did not move (rise, dip, or move at angles, or side to side), but remained stationary throughout. this was an actual event.
